verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.2: “Tua bang thute ka zaza khin a, noʼ hehnepna pen gimna ding bek ahi hi.
verses.3: Khawl hun nei loin gengen lai ding na hi uh hiam? Na gen ding uh omom lai ahi hiam?
verses.4: Note le keimah a kikhek thei hi lehang, noteʼ gen khempeuh kei zong ka gen thei ding hi. Note ka lu hong peisanin thu tampi tak mah kong gen thei ding hi.
verses.5: Ahi zongin keimah in note hong tua cih loin, thuhoih mahmah tawh note hong hehnemin, note hehnepna ding thu ka gen ding hi.
verses.6: Thu gengen taleng ka natna nuamtuam lo a, pau kei taleng zong, phatuam tuan lo hi.
verses.7: Pasian aw, kei nong paatsak ngingei a, ka innkuan khempeuh na sisak mangkhin hi.
verses.8: Kei na hong mancip a, keima gal na suak hi. Ka vun guak le ka guh guak bekin ka om a, keima mawhna a kilatna-in mite in a ngaihsun uh hi.
verses.9: “Pasian in a hehna tawh hong balnen ngingei a, a ha hong gawi sanin hong heh et hi.
verses.10: Mite in kei hong zahko uh a, ka paang a beeng dingin hong kikhawm tuah uh hi.
verses.11: Pasian in migiloteʼ khut sungah kei hong pia hi.
verses.12: Kei nuam takin a om kimlai, Pasian in ka gawlin hong manin, hong bal gawpin hong su gawp hi. Pasian in a muitum dingin kei hong suang a,
verses.13: ka kimkot panin a thaltangte tawh hong kap hi. Tua thaltangte in kei hong kha-in hong liamsak a, tua bang nangawn ah kei hong hehpih lo hi.
verses.14: Amah in hong hehpih het loin kei hong liamsak thuahthuah a, galkap a heh pa bangin kei hong hih gawp hi.
verses.15: “Kei thumin puanhampi ka silh a, guallelin leivui lakah ka om hi.
verses.16: Ka kahkahna-in ka mai khempeuh san gawp a, ka mitkhute bawk gawpin khua ka mu thei kei hi.
verses.17: Ahi zongin ngongtatna them khat zong ka zang kei a, Pasian tungah ka thungetna pen lungsim takpi tawh ahi hi.
verses.18: “Leitung aw, a man loin kei hong kibawlna seelcip kei in! Thuman deihin ka kikona ka awging daicipsak kei in.
verses.19: Kei adingin a ding ding, a hong panpih ding mi khat vantungah om hi.
verses.20: Pasian in ka khitui luanna hong mu-in ka thungetna hong za leh ka ut hi.
verses.21: Mi khat in a lawmpa ading a thumsak mah bangin mi khatpeuh in Pasianʼ kiangah kei adingin hong thuumsak leh ka ut hi.
verses.22: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hun nai mahmah ta a, ka leh zuih nawn loh ding lampi zui-in a pai ka hi ta hi.
